achievements.text: Delivered and installed a wide range of appliances (refrigerators, microwaves, dishwashers, ovens, washers, and dryers) to customers across the greater Atlanta area.
Ensured high levels of customer satisfaction through excellent service, problem-solving, and effective communication.
Developed compelling designs for vehicle wraps, signage, business cards, and various other print and digital marketing materials, often under tight deadlines.
Promoted to Lead Graphic Designer, leading creative direction and project management.
Collaborated closely with clients to refine designs and with the production team to ensure timely delivery of high-quality finished products.

achievements.title: Rapid Career Advancement
achievements.text: Started as a Material Handler with DMX in 2010 and was quickly promoted to RMA Coordinator within six months. Advanced to Inventory Control Supervisor in 2011, overseeing all inventory transactions, daily cycle counts, and yearly physical inventories.

achievements.title: Post-Merger Responsibility Expansion
achievements.text: After the merger with Mood Media in 2012, took on responsibility for inventory management across all U.S. warehouses. Conducted site visits to every U.S. warehouse in 2014 to lead physical inventories and implement best practices.

achievements.title: Process Optimization
achievements.text: Created and implemented standard operating procedures (SOPs) to enhance efficiency, accuracy, and quality in the Receiving, Returns, and Fabrication departments of the Atlanta Operations Center (AOC). Promoted methods for maintaining high standards in inventory and financial accuracy and trained team members to adhere to these guidelines.

achievements.title: Subject Matter Expert (SME)
achievements.text: Recognized as an official SME in Oracle EBS for several business processes, including inventory, manufacturing, and purchasing, assuming primary responsibility for testing and training in these areas. Collaborated with the company's Controller and external auditors to ensure inventory reporting accuracy and compliance with best practices.

achievements.title: Data Analysis and Reporting
achievements.text: Transitioned into data analysis by partnering with the Senior Data Analyst to develop advanced analytical skills, including complex SQL database queries and custom BI reporting.

achievements.title: Advanced Excel Expertise
achievements.text: Developed and led Excel training seminars for management personnel in the AOC, enhancing their ability to utilize advanced Excel functions for inventory management, reporting, and data analysis.

achievements.title: Custom Website Design
achievements.text: Designed tailored websites for financial institutions, managing projects from initial concept to functional prototypes, ensuring alignment with the client's brand, needs, and aspirational goals.

achievements.title: Front-End Development
achievements.text: Developed sites using HTML, SCSS, Bootstrap, and Vanilla JavaScript; collaborated closely with the development team to meet approved design standards, with a strong emphasis on accessibility, adhering to WCAG (Web Content Accessibility Guidelines) standards.

achievements.title: Technical Leadership
achievements.text: Introduced the team to Visual Studio Code and became the primary coder for design mockups, handling both personal and team projects. Built a custom micro-framework with standardized SCSS and JavaScript functions, adopted by all team members to streamline prototyping and development processes.

achievements.title: Process Efficiency
achievements.text: Reduced prototype delivery times from the standard two-week window to as little as three days by transitioning from static mockups in Photoshop to a code-first approach, enabling quicker iterations, improved efficiency, and increased client satisfaction.

achievements.title: React Development
achievements.text: Created a complex, multi-step React form for customer intake, enhancing user experience and data collection efficiency.

achievements.title: Award Recognition
achievements.text: Awarded the “Web Delivery Challenge” in 2016 for consistently moving clients from concept to approved, functional prototypes faster than the company benchmark.

achievements.title: Revenue Growth
achievements.text: Engineered custom Node.js and GAS (Google Apps Script) software integrations, increasing efficiency and scaling company revenue from $3M to $10M annually by leveraging 3rd-Party REST APIs, including Amazon's Selling Partner API and Walmart's Developer API.

achievements.title: Process Enhancement
achievements.text: Developed and deployed in-house tools built with Node.js and Vue.js for sales performance reporting, advertising reporting, inventory replenishment & forecasting, and internal communication, significantly improving efficiency across departments.

achievements.title: Database Engineering
achievements.text: Architected and maintained MySQL and MongoDB databases, optimizing relational table & document schemas and performing advanced queries to support data-driven business decisions.

achievements.title: Website Development
achievements.text: Developed and integrated WooCommerce websites with custom connections to the WMS platform, including custom PHP plugins and JavaScript webhooks, driving new revenue through B2B and D2C sales.

achievements.title: ERP Implementation
achievements.text: Led the integration of Odoo, scoping and implementing Accounting, CRM, Inventory, and E-commerce business needs, and developing custom Python modules including an RFM Analysis Suite and Return Shipping module.
